channel.title: [PI] there is trade and drop timer but no death timer?
channel.description: i have trade and drop timer but no death timer for new commers? wanted to know how to add death timer to the 15 minute trade and drop timers aswell.

i put deathtimer in client.java right then apply to applydead()?

item.title: [PI] there is trade and drop timer but no death timer?
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

A death timer as in, they cannot die within the first 15 minutes…?

public long deathTimer;

if (deathTimer > 0)
deathTimer--;

Set the death timer to whatever you want when a new player logs in, then apply it to your method.

applyDead();

Read full topic
